concept.title: Euca2ools Guide History
concept.shortdesc: This section contains information about changes to the troubleshooting documentation in this release.

ul.li: We added new commands: euca-fingerprint-key, euca-bundle-and-upload-image, euca-download-and-unbundle, euca-unbundle-stream
We deprecated the access key and secret key options.
We deprecated the eustore commands. Go to http://emis.eucalyptus.com to obtain any pre-packaged images that Eucalyptus Systems provides.
